channel.title: Bow Sword PI
channel.description: Hey, Guys ive tried to make my bowsword be two weapons almost. Ive been trying to make it so if the wielder of the bowsword is more then 4 steps away it attacks useing range. and if it is within those for steps it use's melee, Anyone know how to do this? Thank you!
